title: Looking for various T206 to upgrade
author: blametony

posts.post_title: Looking for various T206 to upgrade
posts.post_content:
I have completed my graded 520 set but I'm looking to upgrade all the cards that are not numerically graded. Here are the cards that I have in Authentic or A grades and I'm looking to upgrade.


Jack Chesbro
George Davis Chicago
Roy Ellam
Ernie Howard Savannah
Tim Jordan Brookyn-Portrait
Christy Mathewson White Cap
Charley O'Leary Hands On Knees
Jim Pastorius
Arch Persons
Dutch Revelle
Harry SteinfeldtPortrait
Fred Tenney

I'd be willing to include these in any trades. Thanks!
